  • 构造器详细资料

    • BidsManager

  • 方法详细资料

    • addBid

      public void addBid​(Buyer buyer, float bidPrice, java.lang.String bidDate) throws BidException
      参数:
      buyer - Buyer instance - who gives the bid
      bidPrice - Bid price - float type
      bidDate - The date of adding to a car
      抛出:
      BidException - When bid date( yyyy{1930-2021}; MM{1-12}; dd{legal for each month}) or bid price(less than 0) is invalid, throw an exception message
      BidException - Bid exception (when it has invalid attributes)

    • getBidHashMap

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Bid> getBidHashMap()
      返回:
      Bid's hashmap containing (String buyerID,Bid bid) pairs
